mutants.code:
import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text != text[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', text).lower()
    return text == text[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::+1]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::-2]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::-0]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::-0]

import re

def check_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('\\W+', '', text).lower()
    return text == text[::--1]
